long_description: SunCloud Zephyr Polarized Sunglasses let you see clearly even in bright glare and are so light you'll forget they're on your face. Polarized lenses reduce glare, block 85% of visible light and block 100% of harmful UV rays. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures. Nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. 8-base-curve lenses allow the frame and lenses to wrap on the wearer's face and protect from side glare, wind and dust. SunCloud Zephyr Polarized Sunglasses have a universal fit that accommodates most faces. Closeout.
short_description: SunCloud Zephyr Polarized Sunglasses let you see clearly even in bright glare and are so light you'll forget they're on your face.
